org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports

Class MonetaryAmount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.MonetaryAmount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MonetaryAmount>

    public class MonetaryAmount
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<MonetaryAmount>
    immutable representation of a transaction. Contains an amount, a date, a precision setting + some fields kept mainly for debugging or "what if some schema will need it" reasons.
